text: Shailesh Lakhman Vara (born 4 September 1960) is a Ugandan-British politician. He was the Secretary of State for Northern Ireland from July 2022 to September 2022. He is a member of the Conservative Party. He has been a Member of Parliament (MP) for North West Cambridgeshire since the 2005 general election. ==References== ==Other websites== *Official website * * Conservative Party – Shailesh Vara *Guardian Unlimited Politics – Ask Aristotle: Shailesh Vara MP *The Times : Election 2005 *Guardian – Class of 2005 *Telegraph – Vara Interview Category:1960 births Category:Living people Category:UK MPs 2005–2010 Category:UK MPs 2010–2015 Category:UK MPs 2015–2017 Category:UK MPs 2017–2019 Category:UK MPs 2019–2024 Category:Secretaries of State for Northern Ireland Category:Conservative Party (UK) MPs Category:Naturalised citizens of the United Kingdom Category:People from Cambridgeshire
title: Shailesh Vara
